meanings.definition: A person who creates compositions using photographs.
meanings.sent1: The talented photocomposer arranged the photos in a beautiful collage.
meanings.sent2: The photocomposer won an award for their stunning photo montage.
meanings.sent3: The photocomposer accidentally mixed up the family photos, creating a hilarious new composition.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a photocomposer, piecing together memories into a seamless narrative.
meanings.sent5: The photocomposer's work was so vivid, it felt like stepping into a dream.

meanings.definition: A device or software used to compose images using photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photocomposer software allowed users to create stunning digital collages.
meanings.sent2: She used a photocomposer to edit and enhance her vacation photos.
meanings.sent3: The photocomposer glitched and turned all the images upside down, creating a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The photocomposer transformed ordinary photos into works of art with just a few clicks.
meanings.sent5: With the photocomposer, anyone can become a digital artist in minutes.
